docs.title: Ataree
docs.text:
Ataree is a Linux runtime security project built using eBPF.

It observes kernel activity in real time and streams structured events to user space for inspection, filtering, and analysis.

docs.title: Goals
docs.text:
• Learn eBPF deeply
  • Build a clean Go runtime architecture
  • Avoid over-engineering
  • Be understandable and hackable

Tip

This documentation will be hand written. No AI slop, only when necessary.
